chipmunk.unlimited.feedback.database

Class ReviewedLectureDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • chipmunk.unlimited.feedback.database.DatabaseWrapper
        • chipmunk.unlimited.feedback.database.ReviewedLectureDatabase

  • public class ReviewedLectureDatabase
extends DatabaseWrapper
    The ReviewedLectureDatabase serves one purpose: Given any LectureItem, it must be able to uniquely identify it and know whether or not the local user has reviewed this lecture and store the values the user gave the lecture. The identification and storing is done by hashing the content of the "toString()" method in LectureItem and storing it. The data is stringified to some extent, and is saved on the form: +---------------+-----------------+----------------------------+ | HASH | RATINGS | COMMENTS | +---------------+-----------------+----------------------------+ | | 1.0.0.1.1 | Great lecture, proffy | +---------------+-----------------+----------------------------+

      • insertLectureItem

        public boolean insertLectureItem(LectureReviewItem item)
        Insert a reviewed lecture item into the database.
        Parameters:
        item - The lecture item rated by the user.
        Returns:
        True if the insertion succeeded, false otherwise.

      • hasUserReviewed

        public boolean hasUserReviewed(LectureItem item)
        Check if the user has review the lecture.
        Parameters:
        item - LectureItem the user MAY have reviewed.
        Returns:
        true if the user has reviewed, false otherwise.

      • getUserReview

        public LectureReviewItem getUserReview(LectureItem item)
        Get the LectureReviewItem if the user has reviewed item.
        Parameters:
        item - The lecture the user may have reviewed
        Returns:
        LectureReviewItem on success, null on failure. Null is returned MORE than !null, so check the return value.

        Returns:
